name: Verify user is able to delete arrival line  And arrival receipt type data before finalizing

testSteps.description: 1: Verify user is able to delete arrival line  And arrival receipt type data before finalizing ({Receipt Type=Arrival, Currency=AUD, Product Type=Vaccine, Product=bOPV, Producer=PT ONEJECT INDONESIA, Commercial Name=BIOPOLIO B1/3, Formulation=Liquid: ready to use, Presentation=10, VVM Stage=1.Initial stage, Routine or SIA=Routine, Origin=Indonesia, Shipping/Freeze Indicator=Alarm, Storage Location=Ambient_2022, Units=20, No Of Vials=20, Volume=20, Total Cost=1000})

children.description: Given User is on home page of SMT application
And User is able to see login button on home page
Validate login button on home page
When User click on login button
Click login button
And User click on Proceed To Login button in "English"
Click proceed to login button: English
Then User login as "Store Operator"
User login: Store Operator
And User click on "Apply" button
Click on button: Apply
And User click on "Arrivals" tab
Click on tab: Arrivals
And User wait for "2" seconds
Given User click on "Log New Arrival" button
Click on button: Log New Arrival
Then "Stock Arrival" text is visible
Validate text is visible: Stock Arrival
And User select "Arrival" from "Receipt Type" in "Arrivals" tab
Select value from dropdown arrivals: Arrival, Receipt Type
And User enter random text in "smtNumber"
Enter random text: smtNumber
Generate randomtext
And User enter random number in "shippingReferance"
Enter random number: shippingReferance
Generate random number12 digits
And User enter random text in "fundingSource"
Enter random text: fundingSource
Generate randomtext
And User select "AUD" from "Currency" in "Arrivals" tab
Select value from dropdown arrivals: AUD, Currency
And User enter random number in "freightCost"
Enter random number: freightCost
Generate random number12 digits
When User click on "Add Line to Arrival" button
Click on button: Add Line to Arrival
Then "Add Product to Arrival" heading is visible
Validate is heading visible: Add Product to Arrival
And User select "Vaccine" from "Product Type" in "Arrivals" tab
Select value from dropdown arrivals: Vaccine, Product Type
And User select "bOPV" from "Product" in "Arrivals" tab
Select value from dropdown arrivals: bOPV, Product
And User enter random text in "batchNo"
Enter random text: batchNo
And User select "PT ONEJECT INDONESIA" from "Producer" in "Arrivals" tab
Select value from dropdown arrivals: PT ONEJECT INDONESIA, Producer
And User select "BIOPOLIO B1/3" from "Commercial Name" in "Arrivals" tab
Select value from dropdown arrivals: BIOPOLIO B1/3, Commercial Name
And User select "Liquid: ready to use" from "Formulation" in "Arrivals" tab
Select value from dropdown arrivals: Liquid: ready to use, Formulation
And User select "10" from "Presentation" in "Arrivals" tab
Select value from dropdown arrivals: 10, Presentation
And User select "1.Initial stage" from "VVM Stage" in "Arrivals" tab
Select value from dropdown arrivals: 1.Initial stage, VVM Stage
And User enter "20" in "units"
Enter text in textbox: 20, units
And User select "Routine" from "Routine or SIA" in "Arrivals" tab
Select value from dropdown arrivals: Routine, Routine or SIA
And User select "Indonesia" from "Origin" in "Arrivals" tab
Select value from dropdown arrivals: Indonesia, Origin
And User select "Alarm" from "Shipping/Freeze Indicator" in "Arrivals" tab
Select value from dropdown arrivals: Alarm, Shipping/Freeze Indicator
And User enter "20" in "noOfVials"
Enter text in textbox: 20, noOfVials
And User enter "20" in "totalVolume"
Enter text in textbox: 20, totalVolume
And User select "Ambient_2022" from "Storage Location" in "Arrivals" tab
Select value from dropdown arrivals: Ambient_2022, Storage Location
And User enter "1000" in "totalCost"
Enter text in textbox: 1000, totalCost
And User enter random text in "comments"
Enter random text: comments
Generate randomtext
When User click on "Create" button
Click on button: Create
And User click on "Continue" button
Click on button: Continue
Then Arrivals line is created successfully
Validate created message displayed
And Arrivals line Data is visible in arrival line table to user
When User click on "Save as draft and go back" button
Click on button: Save as draft and go back
And User click on "Yes" button
Click on button: Yes
And Validate arrival state is "Draft"
Then Arrivals Data is visible in arrivals table to user
And User edit the Arrivals data
When User delete the line in arrival
And User click on "Yes" button
Click on button: Yes
Then Arrivals line is deleted successfully
Validate deleted message displayed
And Arrivals line Data is not visible in arrival line table to user
When User click on "Save as draft and go back" button
Click on button: Save as draft and go back
And User click on "Yes" button
Click on button: Yes
And User delete the Arrivals data
And User click on "Yes" button
Click on button: Yes
Then Arrivals data is deleted successfully
Validate deleted message displayed
And Arrivals Data is not visible in arrivals table to user

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given User click on "Log New Arrival" button
Then "Stock Arrival" text is visible
And User select "<Receipt Type>" from "Receipt Type" in "Arrivals" tab
And User enter random text in "smtNumber"
And User enter random number in "shippingReferance"
And User enter random text in "fundingSource"
And User select "<Currency>" from "Currency" in "Arrivals" tab
And User enter random number in "freightCost"
When User click on "Add Line to Arrival" button
Then "Add Product to Arrival" heading is visible
And User select "<Product Type>" from "Product Type" in "Arrivals" tab
And User select "<Product>" from "Product" in "Arrivals" tab
And User enter random text in "batchNo"
And User select "<Producer>" from "Producer" in "Arrivals" tab
And User select "<Commercial Name>" from "Commercial Name" in "Arrivals" tab
And User select "<Formulation>" from "Formulation" in "Arrivals" tab
And User select "<Presentation>" from "Presentation" in "Arrivals" tab
And User select "<VVM Stage>" from "VVM Stage" in "Arrivals" tab
And User enter "<Units>" in "units"
And User select "<Routine or SIA>" from "Routine or SIA" in "Arrivals" tab
And User select "<Origin>" from "Origin" in "Arrivals" tab
And User select "<Shipping/Freeze Indicator>" from "Shipping/Freeze Indicator" in "Arrivals" tab
And User enter "<No Of Vials>" in "noOfVials"
And User enter "<Volume>" in "totalVolume"
And User select "<Storage Location>" from "Storage Location" in "Arrivals" tab
And User enter "<Total Cost>" in "totalCost"
And User enter random text in "comments"
When User click on "Create" button
And User click on "Continue" button
Then Arrivals line is created successfully
And Arrivals line Data is visible in arrival line table to user
When User click on "Save as draft and go back" button
And User click on "Yes" button
And Validate arrival state is "Draft"
Then Arrivals Data is visible in arrivals table to user
And User edit the Arrivals data
When User delete the line in arrival
And User click on "Yes" button
Then Arrivals line is deleted successfully
And Arrivals line Data is not visible in arrival line table to user
When User click on "Save as draft and go back" button
And User click on "Yes" button
And User delete the Arrivals data
And User click on "Yes" button
Then Arrivals data is deleted successfully
And Arrivals Data is not visible in arrivals table to user

scenarioOutline:
Given User click on "Log New Arrival" button
Then "Stock Arrival" text is visible
And User select "<Receipt Type>" from "Receipt Type" in "Arrivals" tab
And User enter random text in "smtNumber"
And User enter random number in "shippingReferance"
And User enter random text in "fundingSource"
And User select "<Currency>" from "Currency" in "Arrivals" tab
And User enter random number in "freightCost"
When User click on "Add Line to Arrival" button
Then "Add Product to Arrival" heading is visible
And User select "<Product Type>" from "Product Type" in "Arrivals" tab
And User select "<Product>" from "Product" in "Arrivals" tab
And User enter random text in "batchNo"

And User enter "<Units>" in "units"
And User select "<Routine or SIA>" from "Routine or SIA" in "Arrivals" tab
And User select "<Origin>" from "Origin" in "Arrivals" tab
And User select "<Shipping/Freeze Indicator>" from "Shipping/Freeze Indicator" in "Arrivals" tab
And User enter "<No Of Vials>" in "noOfVials"
And User enter "<Volume>" in "totalVolume"
And User select "<Storage Location>" from "Storage Location" in "Arrivals" tab

And User enter random text in "comments"
When User click on "Create" button
And User click on "Continue" button
Then Arrivals line is created successfully

And User edit the Arrivals data
When User delete the line in arrival

Then Arrivals line is deleted successfully
And Arrivals line Data is not visible in arrival line table to user
When User click on "Save as draft and go back" button
And User click on "Yes" button
And User delete the Arrivals data
And User click on "Yes" button
Then Arrivals data is deleted successfully
